column3: Please don't combine refactoring (code style fixups) and a bugfix in one commit. This makes it extremely hard to review what is changed. If you want to do this in one PR, that's okay, but please do it as two separate commits.
Did you remove this comment intentionally?\nEdit: oh! it's re-added in the commit after this. That's a bit strange :)
Ah must have just been a bad commit split, sorry about that
